name: One Hat
description:
Hello yes. You are Hat Duck. Your friend, Scarf Cat REALLY wants to see your amazing new hat. Can you hat-it-up and get your way over to your friend without losing the cleanliness of your head?

Made with Unity 2018 + Corgi Engine. Thanks to Google Fonts for the cute font script

A puzzle platformer by  Yuzu, somik, and Winter!

https://twitter.com/somsomik
